1.0.0.name: wordpress/auto-hide-menubar
1.0.0.description:
This plugin will auto-hide the new WordPress 3.1 administrator menubar seen when logged in and viewing the website.

FEATURES

  • Enable/disable auto-hide feature.
  • Enable/disable auto-loading of jQuery from Google Libraries.
